cbinstall.name: CB Hello World
cbinstall.author: Nick A.
cbinstall.description: This is a hello world plugin used as a rough guideline for novice CB plugin developers. The only thing it does is to read a plugin parameter, read a tab parameter and display something in a new tab.

param.name: hwPlugEnabled
param.label: Hello World Plugin Enabled
param.description: Specify Yes to enable hello world plugin.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Credits:
param.default: This plugin was created by Nick A. with the support of JoomlaJoe and Beat B.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: License:
param.default: This plugin is distributed under a limited GNU/GPL license and cannot be modified to work with anything else outside of the Community Builder suite supported by the Joomlapolis.com site

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Parameters:
param.default: Please look at the relevant tab for additional parameters

tab.name: Hello World
tab.description: This tab is just a basic hello world type project to demonstrate a simple CB API application

param.name: hwTabMessage
param.label: CB Hello World Tab Text
param.description: Actual hello world message to display in the tab (default: Hello Joomlapolitans!).
